Package es.upm.pproject.parkingjam.parking_jam.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
es.upm.pproject.parkingjam.parking_jam.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class that manages the interaction between the view (MainFrame) and the model (Game). It provides methods to control the game flow, such as loading levels, moving cars, and saving the game state.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Controller()
    Initializes the game, the main frame, and the game saver.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller() throws IllegalExitsNumberException, IllegalCarDimensionException
      Initializes the game, the main frame, and the game saver.
      Throws:
      IllegalExitsNumberException - if the number of exits is illegal
      IllegalCarDimensionException - if the car dimensions are illegal

  • Method Details

    • loadNewLevel

      public void loadNewLevel() throws IllegalExitsNumberException, IllegalCarDimensionException
      Loads a new level in the game.
      Throws:
      IllegalExitsNumberException - if the number of exits is illegal
      IllegalCarDimensionException - if the car dimensions are illegal

    • loadSavedLevel

      public int loadSavedLevel() throws IllegalExitsNumberException, IllegalCarDimensionException
      Loads a saved level in the game.
      Returns:
      the level number of the loaded saved level
      Throws:
      IllegalExitsNumberException - if the number of exits is illegal
      IllegalCarDimensionException - if the car dimensions are illegal

    • moveCar

      public char[][] moveCar(char car, int length, char way) throws SameMovementException
      Moves a car on the board.
      Parameters:
      car - the identifier of the car to move
      length - the length to move the car
      way - the direction to move the car
      Returns:
      the updated board state after the move
      Throws:
      SameMovementException - if the same movement is attempted consecutively

    • undoMovement

      public char[][] undoMovement() throws CannotUndoMovementException, SameMovementException
      Undoes the last car movement.
      Returns:
      the updated board state after undoing the move
      Throws:
      CannotUndoMovementException - if no movements can be undone
      SameMovementException - if the same movement is attempted consecutively

      public boolean isMoveValid(char car, Coordinates newCoord, char way) throws SameMovementException
      Checks if a car movement is valid.
      Parameters:
      car - the identifier of the car
      newCoord - the new coordinates for the car
      way - the direction of the movement
      Returns:
      true if the movement is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SameMovementException - if the same movement is attempted consecutively
